lead_paragraph: Wright, the Mets’ third baseman who has been unable to throw because of shoulder pain, refused to say when he might return to the field.
snippet: Wright, the Mets’ third baseman who has been unable to throw because of shoulder pain, refused to say when he might return to the field....

headline.main: Apple, IBM, Microsoft Back Transgender Teen at Supreme Court
